name: Guide Dog Simulator
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys, ESC, Space

A short game made for Jamulator 2021. You are a guide dog and your job is to find and collect your doggy treat and return with it to the finish line without you, or your human, getting caught in traffic or petted by those crazy pedestrians.

Team:

  • https://jackoatley.itch.io/
  • https://jasminejardim.itch.io/
  • https://very-tori.itch.io/
  • obrunomarques
